title: Hologic $8.75 Billion Buyout Loan to Wrap Up With Strong Demand
description: The $8.75 billion debt financing tied to the buyout of medical-device maker Hologic Inc. has been widely considered the leveraged loan market’s first big test of the year. Ahead of its expected pricing on Wednesday, it sent a clear signal that demand for risky debt is strong.
